title: FS: T206 Lundgren Chi/Dahlen Brooklyn OM/Lindaman SGC 80
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Lundgren Chi/Dahlen Brooklyn OM/Lindaman SGC 80
posts.post_content:
Payment via any method you prefer.

E-mail: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]


Lundgren Chicago P150 (the small paper chip on glove caused the grade) $275

Dahlen Brooklyn OM SGC 35   $375

Lindaman SGC 80, very sharp, I think slightly OC back caused lower grade. None graded higher SGC (1 other SGC 80) $SOLD
